channel.title: International Outlets on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in International Outlets on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Plug It In, Plug It In
item.description: Today in Tedium: If you’re traveling away from home for any period of time, power outlets are a pretty good reminder that you’re not in Kansas anymore. Outlets vary wildly depending on the part of the world, and it’s a pain in the butt if all you want to do is plug in a device that you brought from one country to another. You will be frustrated, and there will be tears.
